In our last step we have specified a release so we have an overall plan what we are going to implement during this release. This is a more wide range plan to be more specific and have a plan for a shorter implementation time we are going to creat an iteration.
Before we start working on our tasks and defects we need to setup a Start Date, Due Date and we need to select the items we are planning for this iteration.Â 
  • Select "Iteration 2" in Plans section
    • Set as "Start Date" todays date and as "Due Date" 7 days later. So our Iteration will take 1 week.
    • We also set a capacity of 40 hours which means 1 person is working on this iteration (5 working days * 8 hours)
    • Add our 2 requirements to this iteration and check calculation on the right planning sidebar.
      (Remember, we have added an initial estimate of 4 days for each requirment and our current capacity is set to 1 person working 5 days)
      Hint: In properties configuration you can define a "Default Estimate" (input in hours) for work items which currently have no estimation. It is also possible to configure and use custom estimate types e.g. story points.

    • Set Status of "Iteration 2" to "In Progress" and refresh plan to start calculation
Hint: By default you can only add requirements to an iteration which have been planned in a parent (release) plan
